scripts.install:npm: echo bethehero && npm install && npm run i:npm
scripts.i:yarn: yarn backend && yarn frontend && yarn mobile && cd ..
scripts.i:npm: npm run backend && npm run frontend && npm run mobile && cd ..
scripts.backend: cd backend && yarn install && yarn upgrade
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && yarn install && yarn upgrade
scripts.mobile: cd mobile && yarn install && yarn upgrade
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
